attributes.description: This Automatic 4X4 Bakkie is a great steel of deal. It is great for outdoor and Off-Road adventures. It is also in Excellent condition and has spec and extras you would like including Alloy Wheels,  Rubberized Bin, Side Steps, Snorkel and a Canopy is installed. Brand NEW Front and Back BUMPERS have been installed. Service History is available. Any vehicle bought from us will receive a Premium Valet to the value of R750 before delivery. We take pride in being a family owned and operated business that always refer to our founding principles of integrity, honesty and fairness. With those principles in mind we set out with a customer-centric approach that allows ease of access to the vehicle of your dreams just 5 days or less. We connect customers to any of the major financial institutions in South Africa with an 87% approval rate for potential family members that meet the minimum requirements for financing. With us Service is not a Department, it's in our DNA! We welcome Trade-ins! Trading Hours: Monday - Friday : 8AM to 5PM Saturday & Public Holiday : 8AM to 1PM Sunday : CLOSED Price EXCLUDES Administration, License and Registration Fees.
